snippet.title: F1 24 First Look at Gameplay
snippet.description:
Be One of the 20 with EA SPORTS™ F1®️ 24. Check out the first raw gameplay of the game and prepare for the most authentic F1® driving experience. Pre-order now 👉 http://x.ea.com/79963

Get a first look at gameplay in F1® 24, featuring some of the most iconic tracks on the calendar in dry & wet conditions, to see all the new gameplay updates in action.

00:00 Circuit De Spa-Francorchamps
02:51 Circuit De Monaco
05:13 Silverstone Circuit
07:35 Lusail International Circuit
09:53 Shanghai International Circuit

Be One of the 20 with EA SPORTS™ F1® 24, the official video game of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship™. Unleash Your Champion in pursuit of a legacy-defining F1® Career, the mode’s first major update since 2016. Drive like the greatest and feel at one with the car through the all-new EA SPORTS Dynamic Handling, and Ignite your Passion by connecting to your favorite teams and drivers while proving that you have what it takes across new modes and experiences.

F1® 23 players can jump into Time Trial challenges using the all-new Alpine, Haas, McLaren, and Williams 2024 team cars by pre-ordering F1® 24 Champions Edition by May 1.

Get all the F1®️ 24 information here 👉 http://x.ea.com/79963

Follow all the EA SPORTS F1 social channels 👉 https://linktr.ee/easportsf1
